channel.title: VPS Servers
channel.description: Hello I’m contacting you today on behalf of Nitrous-Networks.co.uk. There a UK based hosting company that has a wide range of services from Game Servers (45p slot) to Dedicated Servers (From £35 AMD Dual Core) or Web Hosting (50p) to VPS’s (£7). I’m hoping that you will take time and consideration in reading this to maybe purchase or switch to us (Nitrous-Networks). From research I understand most Runescape private servers are run on VPS’s, now Nitrous-Networks.co.uk provides great affordable service s whatever your needs. Are VPS’s start at a very minute price of 7GBP per month, with this you get 256mb RAM, 10GB VHD, 10mbit port, 2-3TB bandwidth per month and also a choice between Windows & Linux all in the price. We also do other packages that normally increase by 256mb of RAM each time and 10GB extra on the VHD. www.nitrous-networks.co.uk Direct VPS order link: http://www.nitrous-networks.co.uk/billing/cart.php?gid=5 I sincerely hope I have not wasted my time in writing this message. Best Regards; Harry Beasant (Nitrous-Networks.co.uk VPS Rep)

item.title: VPS Servers
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

By decent I mean a server that isn’t run by 10 year olds.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Servers
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

whip of soulz:

Wanna fuck? Even if it wasn’t against the rules 256mb isn’t enough for a decent server, so fuck off and never come back.

How much you want to bet on that?

Read full topic
